item.description: Disasters can happen in Maine and New England- think of the recent flooding, ice storms and power outages! Taking just a few easy steps to prepare can help you and your pets stay safe during an emergency. Join me for this training and learn what you can do to make your home and family safe during a disaster.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be meeting in the community room

group.name: The Maine Animal Welfare Meetup Group

item.name: Disaster Preparedness for You and Your Pets Training
